getRenderOption

public def getRenderOption(def format)
Creates a renderOption for the given format. Supported values are 'inline' (html fragment), 'html', 'pdf', 'xls', 'doc', 'ppt'
param:
format
return:
IRenderOption

getRenderOption

public def getRenderOption(def request, def format, def genSVG)
Creates a renderOption for the given HTTPServletRequest and format. Supported values for the format are 'inline' (html fragment), 'html', 'pdf', 'xls', 'doc', 'ppt' The request is used to derive the appropriate url used in hyperlinks within reports (e.g. drill-downs). This method allows to enable/disable the use of SVG on a per-request basis (the setting will persist until it is changed)
param:
request
param:
format
param:
genSVG
return:
IRenderOption

getRenderOption

public def getRenderOption(def request, def format)
Creates a renderOption for the given HTTPServletRequest and format. Supported values for the format are 'inline' (html fragment), 'html', 'pdf', 'xls', 'doc', 'ppt' The request is used to derive the appropriate url used in hyperlinks within reports (e.g. drill-downs).
param:
request
param:
format
return:
IRenderOption

Extracts the parameter names of a report design as a list of Strings
param:

return:
List

getReportParams

public def getReportParams(def reportName)
Extracts the report parameters of a report design. The returned list contains a map for each p�arameter containing:
  • name
  • type
  • controlType
  • defaultVal
  • helpText
  • promptText
  • allowBlank
  • listEntries (a list conaining the possibe values for restricted types)
param:
reportName
return:
List

getReportProperties

public def getReportProperties(def reportName)
Returns a map containing the properties of a report design as name/value pairs. The properties contain the BIRT standart properties:
  • IReportRunnable.AUTHOR
  • IReportRunnable.BASE_PROP
  • IReportRunnable.COMMENTS
  • IReportRunnable.CREATEDBY
  • IReportRunnable.DESCRIPTION
  • IReportRunnable.HELP_GUIDE
  • IReportRunnable.REFRESH_RATE
  • IReportRunnable.TITLE
  • IReportRunnable.UNITS
and 3 custom ones:
  • report name
  • report design name
  • absolute file name (including full path)
param:
reportName
return:
List

getReportProperties

public def getReportProperties(def reportName, def userProps)
Returns a map containing the properties of a report design as name/value pairs. The properties contain the BIRT standart properties:
  • IReportRunnable.AUTHOR
  • IReportRunnable.BASE_PROP
  • IReportRunnable.COMMENTS
  • IReportRunnable.CREATEDBY
  • IReportRunnable.DESCRIPTION
  • IReportRunnable.HELP_GUIDE
  • IReportRunnable.REFRESH_RATE
  • IReportRunnable.TITLE
  • IReportRunnable.UNITS
and 3 custom ones:
  • report name
  • report design name
  • absolute file name (including full path)
and user properties which are specified by the userProps
param:
reportName
param:
userProps
return:
List

listReports

public def listReports()
Returns a list of available reports in the reportHome directory. The list contains Maps of property name/value pairs. The properties contain the BIRT standart properties:
  • IReportRunnable.AUTHOR
  • IReportRunnable.BASE_PROP
  • IReportRunnable.COMMENTS
  • IReportRunnable.CREATEDBY
  • IReportRunnable.DESCRIPTION
  • IReportRunnable.HELP_GUIDE
  • IReportRunnable.REFRESH_RATE
  • IReportRunnable.TITLE
  • IReportRunnable.UNITS
and 3 custom ones:
  • report name
  • report design name
  • absolute file name (including full path)
return:
List

listReports

public def listReports(def userProps)
Returns a list of available reports in the reportHome directory. The list contains Maps of property name/value pairs. The properties contain the BIRT standart properties:
  • IReportRunnable.AUTHOR
  • IReportRunnable.BASE_PROP
  • IReportRunnable.COMMENTS
  • IReportRunnable.CREATEDBY
  • IReportRunnable.DESCRIPTION
  • IReportRunnable.HELP_GUIDE
  • IReportRunnable.REFRESH_RATE
  • IReportRunnable.TITLE
  • IReportRunnable.UNITS
as well as 3 custom ones:
  • report name
  • report design name
  • absolute file name (including full path)
and user properties which are specified by the userProps
param:
userProps
return:
List

render

public def render(def reportDocumentName, def parameters, def renderOptions)
Renders a report document into the format specified by renderOptions. Parameters are specified as name/value pairs and will be parsed (by BIRT) into the appropriate format.
param:
reportDocumentName
param:
parameters
param:
reportDocumentName
